title: AMAZING VIEWS! PRIVATE PENTHOUSE SUITE with 50 Shades of Baroque Charm
posting_body: PRIVATE ELEVATOR to this penthouse suite!
Grab your roommates - Close to UCSF, SF State and USF - Great for STUDENTS!
Take the rare opportunity to live in this incredible unit; with incredible views, central location, and spacious floorplan.
This is classic San Franciscan vintage baroque charm and architectural beauty.
Large 1,800 square feet spread out across a sumptuous 3 bed, 2 bath private whole-floor apartment.
Floor-to-ceiling windows, which allow amazing views from most rooms on the floor.
Enormous private heated rooftop deck beholds panoramic views of the City, especially Market Street, Downtown, FiDi.
Beautiful gas fireplace in living room.
Exquisite chandeliers.
Wood-paneled master study/den/private office attached to master bedroom.
The study commands amazing views of the SF skyline, and also has a fireplace.
Elevator w/private ornate foyer entrance.
Laundry facilities are in the building, ample storage space; normal water usage, garbage, and Comcast are included.
1 indoor parking space is included.
Apartment is located in a prime location on Market Street in Twin Peaks - very close and walkable to Eureka Valley/Clarendon Heights/The Castro.
Score of 71 (Very Walkable) and Score of 71 (Excellent Transit).
Owner pays normal water, garbage and Comcast.
Tenant pays electric and gas.
No smoking policy.
No pets preferred.
Credit report required from within last 21 days required and last 2 paystubs.
Move in cost: First month's rent and security deposit.
